head.title: State Pulls the Plug On an Insider's Story

hedline.hl1: State Pulls the Plug On an Insider's Story

block.p: Jeffrey S. Wigand, whose role as a tobacco industry whistle-blower was portrayed in the movie ''The Insider,'' is not a man easily quieted. So it is surprising that state officials would even try. They barred him from speaking last weekend at a conference on youth smoking held by the State Health Department after learning that he planned to criticize Gov. George E. Pataki.
